marketing project management, data manipulation and visualization.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
If you need assistance during the recruiting process due to a disability, please reach out to our Recruiting Accommodations Team through the Accommodation Request form. This form is used only by individuals with disabilities who require assistance or adjustments in applying and interviewing for a job. This form is not for inquiring about a position or the status of an application.

Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

At Expedia Group, we’re passionate about data-driven decision-making. We are seeking a talented Senior Business Intelligence Analyst to join our Workforce Planning Analytics team. If you thrive on solving complex problems, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and turning data into actionable insights, this role is for you! As a Senior Business Intelligence Analyst, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping our organization’s success.

What You’ll Do:

Utilize your perfect knowledge of SQL to extract, transform, and load data from various sources.Create insightful reports and dashboards using Tableau, Looker, or similar tools.Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into effective visualizations.Work closely with our data engineering team to optimize data pipelines.Automate routine tasks to improve efficiency and accuracy.Be the information liaison between our analytics team and business stakeholders.Partner with Real Time and Scheduling, Forecasting, Operations, Finance, and other teams to provide timely insights.Use your critical thinking skills to troubleshoot data-related issues.Respond to stakeholder requests promptly and professionally.Understand our organization’s processes, objectives, and challenges to provide relevant insights.

Who You Are:

Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Computer Science, Business Analytics, etc.); Master’s preferred.Perfect knowledge of SQL—you can write complex queries in your sleep.Proficiency in at least one data visualization tool (Tableau, Looker, Power BI, etc.).Familiarity with Python or other programming languages (preferred)Excellent communication skills—both written and verbal.Detail-oriented and able to maintain accuracy under pressure.3+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analysis, or a related field.Exposure to reporting in a Contact Center environment is highly valuable.

About Expedia Group:

Expedia Group (NASDAQ: EXPE) powers travel for everyone, everywhere through our global platform. Driven by the core belief that travel is a force for good, we help people experience the world in new ways and build lasting connections. We provide industry-leading technology solutions to fuel partner growth and success, while facilitating memorable experiences for travelers. Expedia Group's family of brands includes: Brand Expedia®, Hotels.com®, Expedia® Partner Solutions, Vrbo®, Egencia®, trivago®, Orbitz®, Travelocity®, Hotwire®, Wotif®, ebookers®, CheapTickets®, Expedia Group™ Media Solutions, Expedia Local Expert®, CarRentals.com™, and Expedia Cruises™.

© 2021 Expedia, Inc. All rights reserved. Trademarks and logos are the property of their respective owners. CST: 2029030-50

Employment opportunities and job offers at Expedia Group will always come from Expedia Group’s Talent Acquisition and hiring teams. Never provide sensitive, personal information to someone unless you’re confident who the recipient is. Expedia Group does not extend job offers via email or any other messaging tools to individuals to whom we have not made prior contact. Our email domain is @expediagroup.com. The official website to find and apply for job openings at Expedia Group is careers.expediagroup.com/jobs.

Expedia is committed to creating an inclusive work environment with a diverse workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, disability or age.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
